Job Description
Our client is seeking a talented Quantitative Researcher to join their team in New York. As a Quantitative Researcher you will research and develop innovative quantitative strategies. Researchers explore vast amounts of market data, applying novel machine learning algorithms and statistical approaches to discover and capitalize on trading opportunities.

Requirements:
  • Experience analyzing large datasets with rigorous statistical and ML/AI approaches, including classification, clustering, and regression
  • Ability to generate impactful research in academic or professional pursuits
  • Demonstrate deep knowledge of time-series analysis
  • Advanced understanding of a high-level language for numerical analysis, Python (numpy/scipy stack) preferred
  • Exposure to C++ or related compiled language
  • Interest and enthusiasm for learning about financial markets (previous experience not required)
Education:
  • Earned or will earn a Master’s or Ph.D. in a quantitative field, such as Math, Statistics, Computer Science, or Physics
If you would like to be considered for the position of Quantitative Researcher, or wish to discuss the role further then please leave your details below. Your resume will be held in confidence until you connect with a member of our team
